snippet.title: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival — One Piece Anime 25th Anniversary Collab DLC
snippet.description:
Luffy and the crew have arrived in "Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival"! Join them by playing "UUUUUS!"

In collaboration with the 25th anniversary of the "ONE PIECE" TV anime broadcast, players can enjoy playing the opening theme song, "UUUUUS!", in Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival. Enjoy lively performances as Luffy and the crew don Taiko no Tatsujin designed costumes. Additionally, players can set the Straw Hat Crew as mini-characters in their Don-chan avatars! Don-chan costumes inspired by the Straw Hat Crew will also be available.

This collaboration will be available for Nintendo Switch™ from 1 August with the purchase of the One Piece Anime 25th Anniversary Collab DLC.
#Taiko #ONEPIECE #BandaiNamco
